1371: Alebaren was born in Muurhuysen1 in 1371.

1390: Got married to Trame at age 20 in 1390.

1391: Had a daughter with Trame, Sophia, at age 20.
1392: Had a daughter with Trame, Margareta, at age 21.
1393: Had a son with Trame, Bollarde, at age 22.
Lost mother at the age of 22.
Lost mother at the age of 22.

1394: Had a daughter with Trame, Liudburgis, at age 23.

1396: Had a son with Trame, Wolbrand, at age 25.
1397: Lost his wife Trame while she was giving birth to Everocker in 1397.
